thread.title: India's May industrial growth slows to 2.7 percent
thread.title_full: India's May industrial growth slows to 2.7 percent

author: IANS
title: India's May industrial growth slows to 2.7 percent
text: Moneylife » Economy & Nation » Economy » India's May industrial growth slows to 2.7 percent 42749 India's May industrial growth slows to 2.7 percent 0 Comments, Be the first to comment + COMMENT IANS | 10/07/2015 06:46 PM | India's factory output growth slowed in May to 2.7 percent from 4.1 percent in the month before, official data showed on Friday. According to the data on Index of Industrial Production (IIP) furnished by the Central Statistics Office (CSO), the growth during April-May stood at 3 percent. More in Moneylife
